title: New hepatitis C cases down by almost 70 percent in HIV-positive men in London

title_detail.value: New hepatitis C cases down by almost 70 percent in HIV-positive men in London

summary: New cases of hepatitis C amongst HIV-positive men in London have fallen by nearly 70 percent in recent years. The new analysis of data from three clinics in London found 256 men were diagnosed between 2013-2018. New infections peaked at 17 for every 1,000 people studied in 2015 and fell to six by 2018.
